verses.verse: Thus said<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> Go down<WH3381> to the house<WH1004> of the king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> and speak<WH1696> there this word,<WH1697>

Say,<WH559> Hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh,<WH3068> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> who sits<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of David,<WH1732> you,<WH5650> and your servants, and your people<WH5971> who enter<WH935> in by these gates.<WH8179>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> Execute<WH6213> justice<WH4941> and righteousness,<WH6666> and deliver<WH5337> him who is robbed<WH1497> out of the hand<WH3027> of the oppressor:<WH6216> and do no wrong,<WH3238> do no violence,<WH2554> to the foreigner,<WH1616> the fatherless,<WH3490> nor the widow;<WH490> neither shed<WH8210> innocent<WH5355> blood<WH1818> in this place.<WH4725>

For if you do<WH6213> this thing<WH1697> indeed,<WH6213> then shall there enter in<WH935> by the gates<WH8179> of this house<WH1004> kings<WH4428> sitting<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of David,<WH1732> riding<WH7392> in chariots<WH7393> and on horses,<WH5483> he,<WH5650> and his servants, and his people.<WH5971>
But if you will not hear<WH8085> these words,<WH1697> I swear<WH7650> by myself,<WH5002> says Yahweh,<WH3068> that this house<WH1004> shall become a desolation.<WH2723>

For thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> concerning the house<WH1004> of the king<WH4428> of Judah:<WH3063> You are Gilead<WH1568> to me,<WH7218> the head of Lebanon.<WH3844> Yet surely I will make<WH7896> you a wilderness,<WH4057> cities<WH5892> which are not inhabited.<WH3427>

I will prepare<WH6942> destroyers<WH7843> against you,<WH376> everyone with his weapons;<WH3627> and they shall cut down<WH3772> your choice<WH4005> cedars,<WH730> and cast<WH5307> them into the fire.<WH784>

Many<WH7227> nations<WH1471> shall pass<WH5674> by this city,<WH5892> and they shall say<WH559> every man<WH376> to his neighbor,<WH7453> Why has Yahweh<WH3068> done<WH6213> thus to this great<WH1419> city?<WH5892>
Then they shall answer,<WH559> Because they forsook<WH5800> the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> their God,<WH430> and worshiped<WH7812> other<WH312> gods,<WH430> and served them.<WH5647>

Don't<WH1058> weep for the dead,<WH4191> neither bemoan<WH5110> him;<WH1058> but weep bitterly<WH1058> for him who goes away;<WH1980> for he shall return<WH7725> no more,<WH7200> nor see his native<WH4138> country.<WH776>

For thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> touching<WH413> Shallum<WH7967> the son<WH1121> of Josiah,<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah,<WH3063> who reigned<WH4427> instead of Josiah<WH2977> his father,<WH1> and who went forth<WH3318> out of this place:<WH4725> He shall not return there any more.<WH7725>
But in the place<WH4725> where they have led him captive,<WH1540> there shall he die,<WH4191> and he shall see<WH7200> this land no more.<WH776>

Woe<WH1945> to him who builds<WH1129> his house<WH1004> by<WH3808> unrighteousness,<WH6664> and his rooms<WH5944> by injustice;<WH4941> who uses his neighbor<WH7453>'s service<WH5647> without wages,<WH2600> and doesn't<WH5414> give him his hire;<WH6467>

who says,<WH559> I will build<WH1129> me a wide<WH4060> house<WH1004> and spacious<WH7304> rooms,<WH5944> and cuts him out<WH7167> windows;<WH2474> and it is ceiling<WH5603> with cedar,<WH730> and painted<WH4886> with vermilion.<WH8350>

Shall you reign,<WH4427> because you strive to excel<WH8474> in cedar?<WH730> Didn't<WH1> your father eat<WH398> and drink,<WH8354> and do<WH6213> justice<WH4941> and righteousness?<WH6666> then it was well with him.<WH2896>
He judged<WH1777> the cause<WH1779> of the poor<WH6041> and needy;<WH34> then it was well.<WH2896> Wasn't<WH1847> this to know me?<WH5002> says Yahweh.<WH3068>

But your eyes<WH5869> and your heart<WH3820> are not but for your covetousness,<WH1215> and for shedding<WH8210> innocent<WH5355> blood,<WH1818> and for oppression,<WH6233> and for violence,<WH4835> to do it.<WH6213>

Therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> concerning Jehoiakim<WH3079> the son<WH1121> of Josiah,<WH2977> king<WH4428> of Judah:<WH3063> they shall not lament<WH5594> for him,<WH1945> saying, Ah my brother!<WH251> or,<WH1945> Ah sister!<WH269> They shall not lament<WH5594> for him,<WH1945> saying Ah lord!<WH113> or,<WH1945> Ah his glory!<WH1935>
He shall be buried<WH6912> with the burial<WH6900> of a donkey,<WH2543> drawn<WH5498> and cast forth<WH7993> beyond<WH1973> the gates<WH8179> of Jerusalem.<WH3389>
Go up<WH5927> to Lebanon,<WH3844> and cry;<WH6817> and lift up<WH5414> your voice<WH6963> in Bashan,<WH1316> and cry<WH6817> from Abarim;<WH5676> for all your lovers<WH157> are destroyed.<WH7665>
I spoke<WH1696> to you in your prosperity;<WH7962> but you said,<WH559> I will not hear.<WH8085> This has been your way<WH1870> from your youth,<WH5271> that you didn't<WH8085> obey my voice.<WH6963>

The wind<WH7307> shall feed<WH7462> all your shepherds,<WH7462> and your lovers<WH157> shall go<WH3212> into captivity:<WH7628> surely then you will be ashamed<WH954> and confounded<WH3637> for all your wickedness.<WH7451>

Inhabitant<WH3427> of Lebanon,<WH3844> who makes your nest<WH7077> in the cedars,<WH730> how greatly to be pitied<WH2603> you will be when pangs<WH2256> come<WH935> on you,<WH2427> the pain as of a woman in travail!<WH3205>

As I live,<WH2416> says<WH5002> Yahweh,<WH3068> though Coniah<WH3659> the son<WH1121> of Jehoiakim<WH3079> king<WH4428> of Judah<WH3063> were the signet<WH2368> on my right<WH3225> hand,<WH3027> yet would I pluck you there;<WH5423>

and I will give<WH5414> you into the hand<WH3027> of those who seek<WH1245> your life,<WH5315> and into the hand<WH3027> of them of whom<WH6440> you are afraid,<WH3016> even into the hand<WH3027> of Nebuchadnezzar<WH5019> king<WH4428> of Babylon,<WH894> and into the hand<WH3027> of the Chaldeans.<WH3778>
I will cast you out,<WH2904> and your mother<WH517> who bore<WH3205> you,<WH312> into another country,<WH776> where you were not born;<WH3205> and there you will die.<WH4191>
But to the land<WH776> whereunto their soul longs<WH5375> to return,<WH7725> there shall they not return.<WH7725>

Is this man<WH376> Coniah<WH3659> a despised<WH959> broken<WH5310> vessel?<WH6089> is he a vessel<WH3627> in which none delights?<WH2656> why are they cast out,<WH7993> he and his seed,<WH2233> and are cast<WH2904> into the land<WH776> which they don't<WH3045> know?
O earth,<WH776> earth,<WH776> earth,<WH776> hear<WH8085> the word<WH1697> of Yahweh.<WH3068>

Thus says<WH559> Yahweh,<WH3068> Write<WH3789> you this man<WH376> childless,<WH6185> a man<WH1397> who shall not prosper<WH6743> in his days;<WH3117> for no more shall a man<WH376> of his seed<WH2233> prosper,<WH6743> sitting<WH3427> on the throne<WH3678> of David,<WH1732> and ruling<WH4910> in Judah.<WH3063>
